name: Shell Argina S2 40
description: Lubricant for modern and highly rated medium-speed trunk-piston diesel engine applications

globalDocs.name: Shell Argina S2 40 EN TDG V1.9 23-Jun-2020

localDocs.name: Shell Argina S2 40 United States EN 140002686046 EHS V1.3 17-FEB-2023

marketing: Shell Argina S2 40 is a multifunctional crankcase lubricant for highly rated medium-speed diesel engines operating on residual, blended or distillate fuels. Shell Argina S2 40 has a BN of 20 and is designed for conditions of low oil stress.
